document_name: Decree No. 2021-1840 relating to advertising in favor of motor vehicles
document_description: This decree adopts provisions relating to the display of the carbon dioxide emission class of vehicles in advertising and defines an administrative penalty regime in the event of failure to comply with the obligation provided for in Article L. 328-1 of the Code of the road to include messages promoting active or shared mobility or public transport in the advertising of land motor vehicles.
